name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with over 10 years of progressive experience in developing and managing microservices, cloud-based infrastructures, and CI/CD pipelines. Proficient in **DevOps** practices, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, and **GitOps**, ensuring seamless integration and deployment of applications. Expertise in building scalable SaaS solutions using **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask) and managing cloud services like **AWS** and **Azure**. Strong background in programming with **Java**, **JavaScript**, **Go**, and **C#**, complemented by solid experience in containerization and automation tools. Recognized for analytical skills and a collaborative approach in high-impact projects at prestigious companies including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. Committed to driving efficiency and innovation within teams while enhancing customer engagement.

• Developed **cloud**-based solutions with **Celery** and **Redis** for managing asynchronous processing of financial transaction requests.
• Deployed **microservices** on **Azure App Services** and utilized **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, ensuring efficient and reliable cloud operations.
• Created and maintained data pipelines for regulatory data exchange using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, achieving **99%** reliability in data flow.
• Led security assessments, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C**, enhancing the security and scalability of authentication systems for over **10,000** users.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address system integration challenges in a **DevOps** culture, ensuring compliance and overseeing release strategies with a **3-week** deployment cycle.

• Leveraged **DevOps** practices to develop high-performing backend systems using **Python** and **FastAPI** for automating document workflows, enhancing user onboarding, and managing complex reporting processes with a **99%** uptime.
• Architected scalable, event-driven microservices leveraging **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial data and transaction requests, reducing processing time by **30%**.
• Spearheaded the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services** using **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, ensuring consistent environments across **5** different applications.
• Designed and maintained secure data pipelines for regulatory data exchange utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, optimizing data flow and reducing latency by **25%**.
• Conducted comprehensive security audits and ensured compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to manage authentication and secure access controls.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to guarantee smooth system integration and regulatory compliance, successfully managing release deployments across **3** major product updates.

• Advanced implementation of **DevOps** practices by orchestrating **Kubernetes** in deployment processes, ensuring robust CI/CD pipelines to enhance operational efficiency by **25%**.
• Engineered microservices architecture using **Python** and **Flask** to streamline backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, resulting in improved scalability to handle **10,000+** transactions per minute.
• Developed and deployed automated infrastructure as code using **Terraform** and **Ansible**, leading to **40%** reduction in manual configuration errors.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to establish and maintain **SaaS** solutions, integrating with front-end platforms via REST APIs and **WebSockets**, enhancing user interaction and real-time data delivery.
• Leveraged **GitOps** principles for version control, resulting in **99%** deployment success rates without service interruptions.
• Integrated job queuing and scheduling solutions utilizing **Celery** and **RabbitMQ** to optimize backend task execution and process management.
• Administered comprehensive testing frameworks with **PyTest** and **tox**, achieving seamless quality assurance processes and reducing bug rates by **30%**.
• Established cloud-native solutions for data management in compliance with MiFID II and GDPR regulations, ensuring data security and customer engagement through robust analytical capabilities.
